title: RESPERA - font ID
content:
Looking for an ID on the font used for the RESPERA logo

Many thanks in advance,  
Danny

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140420013118im_/http:/typophile.com/files/13615689553_3e58867666_b_4731.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [13615689553\_3e58867666\_b.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140420013118/http:/typophile.com/files/13615689553_3e58867666_b.jpg) | 241.67 KB |
author: Danny_Miller

comments.content:
I did not spot an exact match, but it's possible that the logo might be based on a modified Perpetua [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/perpetua/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140420013118/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/perpetua/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/perpetua/")  
Don
